com.strato.hidrive.api.session

Class HiDriveSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.strato.hidrive.api.session.HiDriveSession

  • public class HiDriveSession
extends Object
    HiDrive session incapsulation. Should be used for linking to hidrive services. Keeps track of a logged in user. Contains configuration options for the HiDriveRestClient.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  HiDriveSession.HiDriveSessionListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked after authorization.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Constructs session object configured for linking

      Get associated session events listener

      Returns instance of OAuthTokenManager - object containing oauth token information.
      String getUserName()
      Returns currently linked user name or empty string

      Allows to determine is internet reachable

      Returns whether or not this session has a user's access token and secret.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HiDriveSession

        public HiDriveSession(Context context,
              String clientId,
              String secret,
              HiDriveSession.HiDriveSessionListener listener)
        Constructs session object configured for linking
        Parameters:
        context - activity context, used for this session. After linking or if session already linked can be used application context.
        clientId - HiDrive application clientId
        secret - HiDrive application secret
        listener - session listener object

    • Method Detail

      • unlink

        public void unlink()
        Unlinks the session by removing any stored access token.

      • isLinked

        public boolean isLinked()
        Returns whether or not this session has a user's access token and secret.

      • link

        public void link()
        Connecting to HiDrive service using oauth2.0. Will display authorization dialog. After successful authorization access token will be stored.

      • isInternetReachable

        public boolean isInternetReachable()
        Allows to determine is internet reachable
